name: Sunday Night Singin' (ALPHA)
description:
Sunday Night Singin' (Alpha)

You are on your way to becoming a famous rapper! But, there is one problem. A lot of professional rappers want to battle you for an unknown reason!

USE ARROW KEYS TO PLAY

It's basically like DDR and FNF, press the arrow button when the arrow is over the other arrow.

CREDITS

@BTN4 YT - EVERYTHING
